snippet.title: After 2 years of game development, "The Medieval PSYCHOLOGIST" is now on Steam -TEASER -
snippet.description: As a solo game developer, I opened the Steam page of the game I was working on. I worked in Unity without using Code and prepared all the visuals and animations in this process. http://store.steampowered.com/app/1787000
